com.sap.spe.pricing.transactiondata

Interface IItemBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IItem, ISPCItem

    public interface IItemBase
    This interface should be implemented by the (sales order) item and is used for callbacks of the pricing engine. It provides information of the (sales order) item which is needed for pricing.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the external (sales order) line item. (R/3-field: KOMP-KPOSN)

      • getSubItemBases

        IItemBase[] getSubItemBases()
        Returns:
        the vector of IItemBase-objects for my direct subItems.

      • getHighLevelItemBase

        IItemBase getHighLevelItemBase()
        Returns:
        my main item.

      • getExternalId

        java.lang.String getExternalId()
        Returns:
        the external ID of the external (sales order) line item for displaying it on the GUI.

      • getProduct

        IPricingProduct getProduct()
        Returns:
        the IPricingMaterial (which should be implemented by the material of the (sales order) line item) of the external item. (R/3-field: KOMP-MATNR)

      • getAttributeEnvironment

        IAttributeBinding[] getAttributeEnvironment()
        Returns:
        a vector of IAttributeBinding-Objects (that are pairs of Attributeclass and AttributeValue) for the pricingItem. The attribute bindings are used to search for condition records.

      • getAttributeBinding

        IAttributeBinding getAttributeBinding(java.lang.String attributeName)
        get attribute binding of given attribute name
        Parameters:
        attributeName -
        Returns:
        attribute binding

      • getVariantConditions

        IVariantCondition[] getVariantConditions()
        Returns:
        a vector of IVarcond-Objects for the pricingItem. The varconds are used to find variant condition records.

      • getExchangeRate

        IExchangeRate getExchangeRate()
        Returns:
        the exchange rate which has been derived by the external (sales order) line item for conversions between local and document currencies.

      • getExchangeRateType

        java.lang.String getExchangeRateType()
        Returns:
        the type for the determination of the exchange rate between document and local currency.

      • getExchangeRateDate

        SAPDate getExchangeRateDate()
        Returns:
        my date for the determination of the rate between document and local curreny.

      • getConditionAccessTimestampEnvironment

        IConditionAccessTimestamp[] getConditionAccessTimestampEnvironment()
        Returns:
        my condition access timestamps

      • getScaleBaseTimestamp

        SAPTimestamp getScaleBaseTimestamp()
        Returns:
        my scaleBase timestamp.

      • getScaleBaseTimePeriod

        TimePeriod getScaleBaseTimePeriod()
        Returns:
        the scale base time period (R/3-fields: KOMP-STF_TAGE, KOMP-STF_WOCHEN, KOMP-STF_MONATE, KOMP-STF_JAHRE).

      • getConditionBaseTimePeriod

        TimePeriod getConditionBaseTimePeriod()
        Returns:
        the condition base time period (R/3-fields: KOMP-ANZ_TAGE, KOMP-ANZ_WOCHEN, KOMP-ANZ_MONATE, KOMP-ANZ_JAHRE).

      • getProductQuantity

        IQuantityValue getProductQuantity()
        Returns:
        the sales quantity of the (sales order) line item. (R/3-fields: KOMP-MGAME and KOMP-VRKME)

      • getBaseQuantity

        IQuantityValue getBaseQuantity()
        Returns:
        the sales quantity of the (sales order) line item in the base unit of measure of the line item's material. (R/3-fields: KOMP-MGLME and KOMP-LAGME)

      • getProductToBaseQuantityRatio

        Fraction getProductToBaseQuantityRatio()
        Returns:
        the fraction which is used for quantity conversion between the sales quantity and the base quantity. (R/3-fields: KOMP-UMVKZ and KOMP-UMVKN)

      • getGrossWeight

        IPhysicalValue getGrossWeight()
        Returns:
        the gross weight of the (sales order) line item. (R/3-fields: KOMP-BRGEW and KOMP-GEWEI)

      • getNetWeight

        IPhysicalValue getNetWeight()
        Returns:
        the netweight of the (sales order) line item. (R/3-fields: KOMP-NETGW and KOMP-GEWEI)

      • getPoints

        IPhysicalValue getPoints()
        Returns:
        the points of the (sales order) line item. (R/3-fields: KOMP-ANZPU and KOMP-PUNEI)

      • getVolume

        IPhysicalValue getVolume()
        Returns:
        the volume of the (sales order) line item. (R/3-fields: KOMP-VOLUM and KOMP-VOLEH)

      • isReturn

        boolean isReturn()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the (sales order) line item is a return. (R/3-field: KOMP-SHKZG)

      • isStatistical

        boolean isStatistical()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the (sales order) line item is statistical for pricing. (R/3-field: KOMP-KOWRR)

      • isTracing

        boolean isTracing()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if pricing analysis should be performed on the pricing item.

      • isUnchangeable

        boolean isUnchangeable()
        Returns:
        a flag which specifies if the pricing conditions should not be changed anymore. In R/3 this flag is set if a sales order item is already (partially) billed.

      • getExternalDataSource

        IExternalDataSource[] getExternalDataSource(IPricingConditionType pricingConditionType)
        Returns:
        a condition rate for example for the moving average price. This callback method could also be used for other pricing conditions.

      • getFixationGroupName

        java.lang.String getFixationGroupName()
        Returns:
        a string which indicates which conditions should NOT be searched for (Fixation Group) Is given to java through the interface with CRM

      • getMultiplicity

        java.math.BigDecimal getMultiplicity()
        Returns the multiplicity of an item.

      • isLoadedFromPersistency

        boolean isLoadedFromPersistency()
        to check whether this item is loaded from Persistency/DB or not currently designed for delayed/lazy item load scenario
        Returns:
        true if item is loaded from Persistency otherwise false
